Package com.rbmhtechnology.vind.api.query.filter

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FilterQuerySerializer  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Filter
    Abstract class to be implemented by filter query objects (Filter.AndFilter, Filter.OrFilter, Filter.NotFilter, Filter.TermFilter, Filter.DescriptorFilter, Filter.BetweenDatesFilter, Filter.BeforeFilter, Filter.AfterFilter, Filter.BetweenNumericFilter, Filter.GreaterThanFilter, Filter.LowerThanFilter) and providing static user friendly methods to create them.
    Filter.AfterFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.AndFilter
    Filter Class implementing the query AND logic operation.
    Filter.BeforeFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.BetweenDatesFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.BetweenNumericFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.ChildrenDocumentFilter
    Filter Class implementing a has nested documents filter.
    Filter.DescriptorFilter<T>
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.GreaterThanFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.LowerThanFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.NotEmptyFilter
    Filter Class implementing a field empty filter.
    Filter.NotEmptyLocationFilter
    Filter Class implementing a location field empty filter.
    Filter.NotEmptyTextFilter
    Filter Class implementing a text field empty filter.
    Filter.NotFilter
    Filter Class implementing the query NOT logic operation.
    Filter.OrFilter
    Filter Class implementing the query OR logic operation.
    Filter.PrefixFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by prefix value.
    Filter.TermFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.WithinBBoxFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
    Filter.WithinCircleFilter
    Filter Class implementing a filter by field value.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Filter.Scope
